TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WinHttpHandler extends System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler

summary.span: 是以 Windows 的 WinHTTP 介面為基礎的特殊訊息處理常式，預定在伺服器環境中使用。

span.span: is a specialty message handler based on the WinHTTP interface of Windows and is intended for use in server environments.

summary.span: 透過將這個類別安裝為 NuGet 封裝，其也可用於桌面應用程式。

span.span: This class is also available for use in Desktop apps by installing it as a NuGet package.

summary.span: 如需安裝此類別以用於桌面應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 [System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=620067)。

span.span: For more information about installing this class for use in Desktop apps, see [System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=620067).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是類似於其他現有類別例如。 is similar to other existing classes such as . 提供的處理常式下方執行個體，並用於 HTTP 要求傳送至伺服器，並接收伺服器回應。 provides a handler underneath an instance and is used to send HTTP requests out to a server and receive server responses. 被設計用於主要是在伺服器環境中的 ASP.NET Core 與其他.NET 應用程式與 HTTP 伺服器通訊。 is designed to be used primarily in server environments by ASP.NET Core and other .NET applications that communicate with HTTP servers. 也為開發人員提供更細微地控制應用程式的 HTTP 通訊比類別。 also provides developers with more granular control over the application's HTTP communication than the class. 這可讓開發人員實作更進階的 HTTP 狀況，或修改系統預設值 （例如，proxy 設定、 逾時與伺服器 SSL 憑證驗證）。This allows developers to implement more advanced HTTP scenarios or modify system defaults (for example, proxy settings, timeouts and server SSL certificate validation). 不是要取代，它是針對案例所提供的更進階的版本其中並不足以執行開發人員。 is not intended to be a replacement for , it is a more advanced version provided for scenarios where is insufficient for developers. 實作為 Windows 的 WinHTTP 介面上的精簡型包裝函式，而且僅適用於在 Windows 系統上。 is implemented as a thin wrapper on the WinHTTP interface of Windows and is only supported on Windows systems. 當使用多個處理常式，鏈結應該鏈結的底部。When using a chain of multiple handlers, should be at the bottom of the chain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::DecompressionMethods AutomaticDecompression { System::Net::DecompressionMethods get(); void set(System::Net::DecompressionMethods value); };
member this.AutomaticDecompression : System.Net.DecompressionMethods with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定解壓縮方法的類型，此為 HTTP 內容回應的自動解壓縮處理常式所使用。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of decompression method used by the handler for automatic decompression of the HTTP content response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 GZip | Deflate。The default value for this property is GZip | Deflate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutomaticRedirection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutomaticRedirection : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出此處理常式是否應該接在 HTTP 重新導向回應之後。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler should follow HTTP redirection responses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 true。The default value for this property is true. 在此組態中，所有的 HTTP 重新導向回應，從伺服器將遵守自動除了如果它們重新導向的 HTTPS 端點的 HTTP 端點。In this configuration, all HTTP redirect responses from the server will be followed automatically except if they are redirecting from an HTTPS endpoint to an HTTP endpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CheckCertificateRevocationList { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CheckCertificateRevocationList : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在 SSL 憑證驗證期間是否要檢查憑證撤銷清單。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to check the revocation list of certificates during SSL certificate validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 false。The default value for this property is false.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示憑證是否會從憑證存放區自動選取，或呼叫端是否允許傳入特定用戶端憑證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the certificate is automatically picked from the certificate store or if the caller is allowed to pass in a specific client certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 。The default value for this property is .

summary.span: 如果 屬性設定為 Manual，請取得或設定處理常式用於用戶端驗證之用戶端驗證 SSL 憑證的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of client authentication SSL certificates that are used for client authentication by the Handler if the property is set to Manual.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為空集合。The default value for this property is an empty collection.

summary.span: 取得或設定受管理的 Cookie 容器物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the managed cookie container object.

summary.span: 只有當 屬性設定為 UseSpecifiedCookieContainer 時，才使用這個屬性。

span.span: This property is only used when the property is set to UseSpecifiedCookieContainer.

summary.span: 否則， 方法將擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Otherwise, the method will throw an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 `null`。The default value for this property is `null`.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出應如何管理和使用 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how cookies should be managed and used.

summary.span: 開發人員可以選擇忽略 Cookie、允許處理常式自動管理 Cookie，或使用 物件以手動方式處理 Cookie。

span.span: Developers can choose to ignore cookies, allow the handler to automatically manage them or manually handle them using a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 。The default for this property is . 如果此值設為，則必須初始化並指派給容器物件屬性。If this value is set to , then a container object must be initialized and assigned to the property. 否則，當嘗試傳送要求時，例外狀況就會擲回。Otherwise, an exception will be thrown when trying to send a request.

span.span: The maximum number of allowed HTTP redirects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 50。The default value for this property is 50. 如果，這個值只適用於設`true`。This value only applies if is set to `true`.

span.span: The maximum number of TCP connections allowed to a single server.

member this.MaxResponseDrainSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可從回應中清空的資料的數量上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of data that can be drained from responses in bytes.

value.span: 以位元組為單位的回應可以清空的資料數量上限。

span.span: The maximum amount of data that can be drained from responses in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 65536。The default value for this property is 65536.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxResponseHeadersLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxResponseHeadersLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定來自伺服器回應之標頭部分的大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the header portion from the server response in bytes.

value.span: 從伺服器回應，以位元組為單位的標頭部分的大小上限。

span.span: The maximum size of the header portion from the server response in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會防止未經授權的伺服器嘗試安裝用戶端所傳送的回應包含無限數量的標頭資料中的用戶端。This property protects the client from an unauthorized server attempting to stall the client by sending a response with an infinite amount of header data. 這個屬性的預設值為 65536。The default value for this property is 65536.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler sends an Authorization header with the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 false。The default value for this property is false.

public: property Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ ServerCertificateValidationCallback { Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ get(); void set(Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ value); };

member this.ServerCertificateValidationCallback : Func<System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain, System.Net.Security.SslPolicyErrors, bool> with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證伺服器憑證的回呼方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a callback method to validate the server certificate.

summary.span: 此回呼是 SSL 信號交換的一部分。

span.span: This callback is part of the SSL handshake.

value.span: 如果伺服器憑證有效，而且應該傳送的要求，應傳回 true 的回呼。

span.span: The callback should return true if the server certificate is considered valid and the request should be sent.
Otherwise, return false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 null。The default value is null. 如果這個屬性為 null，就會使用標準的已知憑證授權單位會驗證伺服器憑證。If this property is null, the server certificate will be validated using standard well-known certificate authorities.

span.span: The credentials to be used by the client to authenticate to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 null。The default value for this property is null.

span.span: The collection of TLS/SSL protocols supported by the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 SslProtocols.Tls | SslProtocols.Tls11 | SslProtocols.Tls12。The default value is SslProtocols.Tls | SslProtocols.Tls11 | SslProtocols.Tls12.

summary.span: 取得或設定 Proxy 設定。

span.span: Gets or sets the proxy setting.

summary.span: 這個屬性可以設定為停用 Proxy、使用自訂 Proxy，或是使用電腦上 WinHTTP 或 WinInet 的 Proxy 設定。

span.span: This property can be set to disable the proxy, use a custom proxy, or use the proxy settings of WinHTTP or WinInet on the machine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值是 WinHTTP 堆疊 proxy 設定。The default value of this property is the WinHTTP stack proxy settings.
